mapper.select: select SL.lcnt, SL.userid, SM.username, SM.usertype from (select count(*) as lcnt, userid from log_login where logintime > #{logintime} group by userid order by lcnt desc ) SL inner join SM01 SM on (SL.userid = SM.userid)
mapper.insert: insert into log_login(userid, logintime, browser, device, ip) values (#{userid}, #{logintime}, #{browser}, #{device}, #{ip})
insert into log_chat_file(userid, logdate, s3filename, ip) values (#{userid}, #{logdate}, #{s3filename}, #{ip})
